title: Product Rule of Exponents
text: For any real number a and natural numbers $$m$$ and product rule of exponents states that $$a^m a^n=a \left(m+n\right)$$.

title: Product Rule of Exponents
text: Use the product rule to simplify the expression: $${\left(-x\right)}^5 {\left(-x\right)}^{-5}={\left(-x\right)}^{5-5}={\left(-x\right)}^0$$

title: Zero Exponent Rule
text: For any nonzero real number a, the zero exponent rule of exponents states that $$a^0=1$$
